sentences.sContent: Of the 100 companies surveyed, 10% had a turnover of £50 m to £99 m.
sentences.sCn: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.sContent: ...Results of USA WEEKEND'S Teens & Parents survey reveal a generation of young people who get along well with their parents and approve of the way they're being raised...
...The survey shows us that today's teens are affectionate...
...the same month the survey was taken...
...And the survey found flat demand for fitness monitors...
...Consumers are becoming increasingly bored with what companies have to offer: A survey...
...The household survey has a larger problem...
...The payroll survey also doesn't capture the number of self-employed...
...The payroll survey can easily double-count someone: if you are one person with two jobs...
...Look at any global survey of gender equality and Sweden will be near the top...
...who used data from a large national survey of college freshmen to evaluate the effect of single-sex versus coeducational high schools...

a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour
